name: Manipulator of Figure 2
description:
Description

Manipulator of Figure 2 - this is the second part of an interesting puzzle that uses physics. You need to deliver the green circle to the purple platform and hold it for 2 seconds to complete the level. The difficulty is that you can not drag the green circle, and you can only affect it with other physical objects. Build paths, build bridges, create balance to deliver the green circle to the platform. Do you have enough wits to complete all the levels?

Features:

- interesting gameplay

- minimalistic picture

- an exciting game with physics

- pleasant music

- various levels
